header_dialog_sharedMenu: Shared menu will be a web component.
cta_mapping_primary_footer: AN OPEN SOURCE, COMMUNITY-LED MAPPING PLATFORM
cta_mapping_secondary_description: Capture and use your own aerial imagery
cta_imagery_primary_footer: Your own aerial imagery with consumer drones.
cta_imagery_secondary_description: The open collection of aerial imagery.
cta_field_primary_footer: Contribute to on-the-ground mapping efforts worldwide.
cta_field_secondary_description: Collect field data with mobile applications and GPS devices.
cta_data_primary_footer: Access OpenStreetMap data in various formats for analysis.
cta_data_secondary_description: Explore datasets from humanitarian mapping initiatives.
product_grid_description: Our platform fosters open collaboration with intuitive products that integrate seamlessly, enabling you to manage complete mapping projects in one place.
products_drone_description: Local residents use accessible drones and generate consistent, high-quality imagery.
products_field_description: Project coordinators organize on-the-ground mapping to add local context to the traced features.
products_taskingManager_description: Remote mappers coordinate their activities and the validated data is uploaded to OpenStreetMap.
products_fair_description: Mappers train and inform AI-mapping models through the whole process.
products_exportTool_description: People download the collected data in various formats.
products_umap_description: Stakeholders visualize data in our free, easy-to-use platform.
products_oam_description: The imagery is uploaded to a public platform that anyone in the world can access and use.
products_chatmap_description: Local residents use intuitive tools for field mapping, such as instant messaging apps.
imagery_p1: Drone and satellite imagery show features on the ground (buildings, roads, and more) that can be tied to a specific location.
imagery_p2: High-resolution, up-to-date imagery is usually costly, while openly available options have lower resolutions or are outdated.
mapping_p1: With eyes on the ground, we now can start tracing the shapes on the imagery and add them to databases, such as OpenStreetMap. The tracing is done remotely, either manually or with Artificial Intelligence (AI).
mapping_p2: Field mapping complements these databases by adding more context about the features (e.g., “this is a hospital”).
mapUse_p1: The information collected in the previous steps is now used by different stakeholders and communities themselves for data-driven action.
mapUse_p2: While most databases and analysis tools are too restrictive due to privacy, costs, or technical knowledge, we’ve lowered the barrier to entry so more people can use them.
loading_projects_error: Error loading projects. Please try again later.
home_workflow_p1: Geospatial data can solve many development and humanitarian issues around the world.
home_workflow_p2: But this can't happen without accessible, easy-to-use tools.
